name: Panty Panic Princess!
description:
Oh no! DEMONS have kidnapped the PRINCESS and stolen all of her LINGERIE!

WHY??

Because DEMONS are PERVS!!

Welcome to the world of PANTY PANIC PRINCESS, a light-hearted, action romp which will see you as a cute, demon-fighting witch collecting lingerie, romancing a princess, and getting into sticky and slimy ecchi situations. Wield spells to fight through hordes of monsters in a classic-style, sprite-based FPS. Destroy illusory walls to reveal hidden paths in order to navigate the demons' domain. Rescue ladies for fame and fortune. Collect panties and offer them to the Dark Goddess of Pantsu to increase your powers!

-First-person exploration and action
-Magic walls, keys, and hidden pathways that allow the levels to be unfolded like a puzzle
-Collect panties!
-Hundreds of sexy boudoir photos
-Donate your panties to the gods to unlock more power!
